website_summaries.verdict: This set of needles is great for experienced knitters and small projects like socks.
pros: Needles score high marks for quality and work well for delicate projects
Very sharp needles for precision work
The package is very compact and comes with a loop to hook on your knitting bag
cons: The price is a little higher than more basic knitting supply kits

customer_reviews.title: Defect end on one of the cables.
customer_reviews.text: Love Chiagoo—have many of their other sets. Unfortunately, on the newest, the twist shorties, the 6” cable has a defective end that won’t twist flush. Edit to add: emailed Chiagoo and they responded quickly and are sending me a replacement. 5 stars for excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MSJones

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set, great value, high quality needles.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little set of sock needles. Very high quality and all the sizes you need for most socks. ChiaoGoo also includes some extras for you. The set comes with both a short and long version of each size listed. The case is great, it makes it easy to keep your needles from getting lost or mixed up. It’s small and compact for travel. This is a must have set for all sock knitters!
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this ChaioGoo Twist shorties with red lace Interchangeable knitting set.
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I love ChaioGoo circular needles. I did have reservations about purchasing this set of needles. Because of people mentioning the needles separated from the cable. I found the cable side has a hole and the needle side has a hole. I used the tools to tighten the needle to the cable by twisting tools opposite ways. The needles have not separated yet. Hope it continues to work, and hope someone finds this useful.
customer_reviews.author: karen mezzacapo

customer_reviews.title: What more can you say, they are ChiaoGoo in a short version!
customer_reviews.text: I love ChiaoGoo needles....all of them, so I am biased when it comes to this review. These are a great set of SMALL needles for socks and other fine work. They come with a lot of accessories and feel terrific. These are my first choice for needles, every time. (I don't take them outside of the house...I don't want to lose them, so these are my at home needles.)
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: So perfect for socks and small projects. Chiaogoo never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cables don’t stay on the needles
customer_reviews.text: The needles are well made, but the cables often unscrew from the needles. I have to constantly tighten them. For the premium price I paid, this shouldn’t happen. I wish I returned them when I first noticed this. (Now I can’t because too many weeks have passed.) Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: J Barbessi

customer_reviews.title: Nice little portable kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit when I began knitting socks. Overall, it's a nice little kit I recommend. It comes with a nice cloth pouch to hold all the needles and some extras. The extras included are some tiny stitch markers I soon found indispensable for knitting socks, along with a small ruler and a couple of caps for the ends of the cords. The only problem I had was that the tips of the needles tend to come unscrewed. I had to remind myself to tighten them every several rows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is ChiaoGoo. Expect the best.
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a Chiaogoo knitting needle that I didn't love. I prefer short needles and love these for socks and baby shoes and socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. They are well made, but difficult to knit with. They are re just to short to get a good grip on. My hands cramped up. Using double pointed needles is easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C

customer_reviews.title: Love My Shorties!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love ChiaoGoo needles anyways so it would stand to reason that I would love these Shorties. These needles are perfect for making socks or anything else small in the round. I love that the pouch has everything you need to get started on your knitting project; there’s even stitch markers (although I have tons). There is also a carabiner so that you can attach the pouch to your knitting bag. Now I must say these needles are small so if you have large hands you may have problems using these...
customer_reviews.author: Shalaina Banks

customer_reviews.title: BEST SOCKS KNITTING SET
customer_reviews.text: Best sock needles ever in my personal opinion and I have 5 other brand named sets like Addi, Knit Picks, Karbonz, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen O’Dell

customer_reviews.title: great for socks and toys
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with these needles. I'm using them on socks and I can imagine they would be great for toys or other small items. Well made. The case is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: Chiagoo twist shorties are perfect for socks, mittens, and lace
customer_reviews.text: These Chiagoo twist shorties are awesome! They are perfect for socks, mittens, and lace. They are very sharp. The joins dont catch and the cords are memory free. I love using these so much more than DPNs. There's no laddering, and socks knit so much faster than on DPNs. Also, when the needle is joined to the cord, it doesn't come apart. It has two places to twist so they stay together better than others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: R Stenclik

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to get these??
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this set!!! I avoided interchangeable needles for years because I thought they'd be a pain to use and come undone, but after trying this set I have completely changed my mind and haven't even touched my fixed circulars! Highly, highly recommend getting this set of needles. I wish I could have two of these as I always have several WIPs! I absolutely ADORE the cables and the needles feel strong and nice in hand. Love, love, love!!!
customer_reviews.author: JaNaeSyx

customer_reviews.title: Love the set!! Perfect for sleeves and mitts.
customer_reviews.text: I use small-sized needles for a lot of my knitting, i.e., socks, lace, etc. This needle set is a perfect addition to my knitting tools. I think this set is amazing and the stainless steel tips are strong, pointy and smooth! The cables are NOT kinky, or curly...they straighten right out. I have a set of fixed circular and that was why I purchased this set...HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Marina🌿

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit intimidated at first but after trying them out they are surprisingly simple to work out! I am happy and filled with many projects in queue. I am quite fond of the mini packaging and have never used such flexible cords before. Will definitely go back for more Chiagoo products. After working on my first project with these I can testify that these are the easiest needles I have ever knitted with! I am excited to try bigger projects and longer cables in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Magali Escoto

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Although the needles are excelent quality it was not crear to me these were soo little! I am not sure if i would ever use them. It was quité dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pia Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Chiaogoo shorties, small
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Socks are now my favorite thing to knit. Some people are put off by the smaller cable. I was as well but after I knit on the size 2 tip I understood it’s necessary. As long as you remember to “stretch” your stitches on the tip before sending them to the cable you should have no trouble with uneven stitches. The case is perfect! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: SamnMick

customer_reviews.title: Adore these little guys!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for sock and other tiny knitting. I wanted versatility to travel with. I prefer bamboo needles usually, but was worried I would snap one traveling and be stuck without. These knit and handle beautifully and pack up so tiny and safe they are a dream to travel with. So glad I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: interchangeable with the other TWIST MINI sets, if you want a longer cord. I really don't need both 2" and 3" tips, but it's nice having the larger gauges that this set offers. very compact and nice to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Bana

customer_reviews.title: A compact and organized solution
customer_reviews.text: I very much enjoy using these needles. I have what I need for all my projects. Easily identifiable makes it a breeze to pick out what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ray in New Ipswich

customer_reviews.title: Sock knitters, these are a must!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really a Sock knitter but I do make small things in the round. I love these needles for hats and top down sleeves. So much easier than double points.
customer_reviews.author: S Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great needles for small hands
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of needles, but man do they make my hands cramp up. There just isn’t enough needles to really get a hold of your knitting and I found it too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this needle set.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of interchangeable set. I am enjoying knitting with this set. However for a first time user, they did not share enough instructions. I ending up breaking the stopper with the first use which was extremely disappointing. My project called for 16" needles, so I also had to purchase a set of 2" mini cable extenders.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Kiviniemi

customer_reviews.title: Chiao goo shorties mini set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this knitting needle set. Light weight comfortable and the cords have memory free.
customer_reviews.author: tuyet m.

customer_reviews.title: Best products ever
customer_reviews.text: Chiaogoo products are outstanding and great value. They are the only needles I have. I have complete sets of all interchangeables including several Tunisian hooks. I don’t need anything else and they all fit into small packets
customer_reviews.author: E. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Too tiny for my hands
customer_reviews.text: These really are the "Ferrari" of knitting needles, but I found they were too tiny for my hands and had to return them. Very expensive and I knew I wouldn't use them. I had hoped the small sizes would work for my many projects but it wasn't meant to be.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective cable and the connection to the needle broke off in the cable! Haven’t even had a chance to knit with them! I would expect for the price they are charging I’d at least get to use them before they fall apart!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela CT

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Getting longer cords is an issue. Ordered and it goes to a different set. Amazon needs to label them more clearly for the cords that only work for the mini set. Otherwise they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Niezurawsi

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: The casing was better quality than I expected. Items are so tiny and light weight. Needle holder material is sturdy but there's a pseudo compartment behind the first row so be careful how you put back your needles. My 2inch needles were all out of the casing when arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nunis

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I would be able to use these super-short knitting needles, but I love them. Perfect for a pair of mittens.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I know some people have difficulty with hand pain. Luckily I do not. I use them all the time. Joins, cables and tips are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: debleff

customer_reviews.title: Live the red twist cords.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite needles to use. Love the cords on these needles. I have purchased more and these are now my go to needles. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful needles
customer_reviews.text: I have been testing these needles out for about a month now. It is wonderful to be able to knit socks in the round, it saves so much time and avoids the dreadful seaming for those who hate it. There is a little learning curve when it comes to using such short length needles, as I have always relied on needle length to hold onto, but it doesn't take long to find comfort. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: april foote

customer_reviews.title: Needles come off the cord - very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I heard good reviews about these needles from few different youtube channels so I got the all of their sets. Needles came unscrew from the cord so many times. You would need to check the connection every few rows of knitting. Needles and cords are nice but I would not recommend this set. Addi needles are so much better.
customer_reviews.author: luv2creat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sock project.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of short circular needles. They more than met my expectations. They are a perfect addition to my knitting needle collection.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set and chiaogoo does it once again! So far I love all of their things I have and these will be useful for my smaller projects
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and versital"
customer_reviews.text: I am making lace scarves and socks! I love the needles! Very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.text: Use these for making my socks. I can knit much faster with the mini circular needle as I don't have to keep turning the needles like I do when I am using the five needle case. The case they come in is compact and easy to carry with you when traveling. Needles do not come loose from the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product knit like dream!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute necessity for anyone who does small guage items like socks and baby items they are amazing!! If you like fixed 9 & 12” needles you will flip over this set!! Highly versatile, long needed in the knitting world
customer_reviews.author: Jean Walters

customer_reviews.title: Love Chiaogoo needles
customer_reviews.text: I wish that set had US 00 and US 000, overwise I love it. You can build different lengths and that every size has 2 sets of needles. And they are super sharp
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: the shorties are just the cutest needle sets ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! So tiny, and cute and come with everything you need to work small circumference projects. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Frias

customer_reviews.title: Thank you !
customer_reviews.text: Versatile - My favorite brand adorable package - arrived the next day in perfect condition- great price
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Tiny circulars
customer_reviews.text: These are tiny. But, they're perfect for cuffs, socks, & small circular knitting.
customer_reviews.author: ajsgramma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value, Great Cords!!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent needles. The stitches glide like a dream and the join is so smooth. The cords are no-memory, which are the best interchangeable cords I have ever used, finally a cord that doesn't get in the way!! Already working up a sweater!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my tool kit
customer_reviews.text: These are great, the only thing I would like is extra cables.
customer_reviews.author: Rollingcow

customer_reviews.title: Nice needle kit
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy of putting them in my knitting bag.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: easily interchangable, good quality
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I needed for sleeves and will work great for socks. Great quality, all my needles are chaiogoo interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: Run4Fun

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: Chiagoo has yet to disappoint. Their memory free cables can’t be beat. I already own the red lace complete set and love it 😍.
customer_reviews.author: sharon wiedmaier

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Chiaogoo never disappoints! Quality product that makes sock knitting a dream!
customer_reviews.author: kelly snapp

customer_reviews.title: Tell us everything that is in the package
customer_reviews.text: The description did not indicate it would only come with one interchangeable cord, for the price it should at least come with 3 or tell us there is only one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smallest needles that would go with you anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: The needles are compact. Sock peojects would be easy. But because of the needle sizes. I think one need to be really careful.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great portable short small-gauge needles
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and compact, lots of thought into product design.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set. Can get longer Mimi cords and make magic loop.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schweitz

customer_reviews.title: very good!
customer_reviews.text: It was very useful to knit my hand warmer. So small and cuty bag is easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: yuni

customer_reviews.title: Very small knitting needles
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and the receiver was thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: sherie snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these needles. They are exactly like I expected.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So tiny, just what i was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I waited forever for these and it was worth the wait. I really like them. It took me a couple of rows to get used to them but I love them.
customer_reviews.author: CSA

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful well-thought-out set
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful set, with all the details so well thought out. Needles in two lengths, so that you can work on small-diameter things with the shorter tips, but for larger things, have the longer tips. Three lengths of cables... which are so super tiny! Multiple keys and a pair of end stoppers. And really well designed cases to hold all these tiny things. The black snap pouch holds the needle tips securely . The red zipper pouch holds the black case with needles and the cables; in a second smaller pocket, the tiny accessories can be stored. Really love this. It would be a great gift for knitters who work with small-gauge things.
customer_reviews.author: Mainiac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Socks and Sleeves.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love Chiaogoo needles. They are slick with just the right amount of grip to keep stitches in place. Although the 2 inch needle length is exactly same as the 9 inch circulars, the laces in the interchangeable set are much thinner and therefore more flexible than the fixed circulars ( I have both kinds for comparison). The only complaint would be I wish this set would come with the silicone heart to make tightening and loosening the needle cable join easier.
customer_reviews.author: B.Momma

customer_reviews.title: Superb Chaiogoo quality
customer_reviews.text: You honestly can't ever go wrong with Chai, period. Remarkable high quality that you won't regret purchasing. Yes, the price is higher than going to Walmart, Joann, or Micheals... But it is lifetime quality. You just can't go wrong investing in quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I like using small/short circular needles for socks and this needle set is amazing for what I like. The connectors worked well and were fairly easy to attach. The package is well done too, and so small it fits in my back pocket. I would not recommend them to anyone who has large fingers or does not like working with a nine inch circular, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mary BeVard

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I tried working with shorter needles!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. My first pair was a set of Chiaogoo 9" needles for some fingerless mitts and I was hooked. I didn't think I would like the short needle length but I did. This set is wonderful. I love that there are two sets of tips for each size. I've also read that Chiaogoo has great customer service so I know if theres ever any problems with the connections or cables they will fix it. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Nazu

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: In truth, I am still learning to use these small needles. Any needles from this company is top notch. The Chiagoo needles are fast becoming my favorite needles to knit with. The needles in this set are really tiny and I have been using them for sock knitting and for picking up stitches in the gusset, they are superb. If anything happens to this set, I wouldn't hesitate to order again.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my interchangables
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these for knitting sleeves/cuffs and also for baby/kids knits. I love my Chiagoo interchangeable and wanted to add more possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Penny S. Mosher

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy to have these for sock knitting
customer_reviews.text: The two different sizes are very useful, though I prefer the longer ones. The lengths of the cables are perfect for magic loop sock making or just knitting in the round. I love that there is a clip on the bag so you can keep it on your knitting bag at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Best needles ever!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about them. Perfect amount of grip so yarn does not slip and slide yet they knit like sticks of butter. I wish I had invested in Chiao Goo before wasting money on inferior brands. My momma always said "You get what you pay for."
customer_reviews.author: readmorejane

customer_reviews.title: Happy knitting 🧶
customer_reviews.text: I own four sets of Chiagoo knitting needles. I purchased the mini set for knitting socks. They are perfect for any small project. Same smooth connection flexible wire, and the two different needle lengths.
customer_reviews.author: D Leazer

customer_reviews.title: Great Needles and Value
customer_reviews.text: Love 💕 this brand of needles. Seldom use anything else. Returned my Addi brand. These are the best brand out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: The Reason for Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like these needles and cables. The only reason for 2 stars is the cable connector is sharp and has cut a strand or two of my yarn as it moves over it. I had to order a larger cable to prevent this from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Labbermom

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a fair product and it is fairly priced. however, having tried them I think I prefer dpns. for most of it you have to use two needles to do the job, and the tiny needles are harder on the hands than dpns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love tiny needles
customer_reviews.text: I thought about these for months and I love them just as much as my regular Chiagoos.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Lady

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled with this. It helped make finishing a set of socks sooooo much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stephens

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Chiaogoo are the best knitting needles I’ve used. And the cords don’t twist or kink👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Ilo H. Tefft

customer_reviews.title: Love ChiaoGoo
customer_reviews.text: It is a present 🎁 next year will order one for my self, if they come down in the mid $50.
customer_reviews.author: Saskia B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for socks
customer_reviews.text: Very hard item to find locally. Thanks for having these sizes available. Perfect for my projects.
customer_reviews.author: John Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: The set was complete and it came quickly. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rexroat

customer_reviews.title: Check for bent needles
customer_reviews.text: Really like the set but I am waiting on a replacement because one of the needles arrived bent.
customer_reviews.author: rc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set as usual chiagoo is quality
customer_reviews.text: There is definitely a learning curve with theses mini needles but sonneat to have.
customer_reviews.author: S.K

product_meta.title: CHIAOGOO Interchangeable Needle Tips, Twist Red Lace Mini, Stainless Steel, Red, 2-3.25 mm
feature_bullets: The world's thinnest and shortest interchangeable needles
Made from high quality surgical steel
The set includes 12 pairs of needle tips in 2 lengths (5 and 8 cm) in 6 thicknesses (2.00 mm, 2.25 mm, 2.50 mm, 2.75 mm, 3.00 mm, 3.25 mm).
Also included in the set: three red patented MINI premium ropes (13cm, 15cm and 20cm), 4 rope spanners, 2 cable connectors, 2 end stoppers, 6 stitch markers and a mini needle gauge.
